channel.title: IoT, jobs, startups on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in IoT, jobs, startups on David G. Simmons

item.title: So What's With All The Jobs??
item.description: If you’ve been following along lately, you’ll notice that a bunch of stuff has been happening with me. First, I lost my job, Then I started a company, Dragonfly IoT, and made myself the CTO of it (because I could, you know). And yesterday I was appointed the new CTO of another startup, Chimera IoT. So that’s a lot of jobs, and a lot of CTO jobs, for just one person.
